title: Part Visibility
description: Sets conditions for when the block's different parts are visible.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: A JSON object that contains a list of key/value pairs that map from bone name in a geometry file (key) to a condition that turns their rendering on/off (value). The condition should be a Molang query that uses block properties to determine true/false. Supported queries include 'has_block_property', 'block_property', and other queries that can evaluate without knowledge of the block's in-game positional or player affected data.
